column1: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
The depression over the southwest Bay of Bengal has intensified into a deep depression. The system   was
located to southeast about 280 km of Trincomalee at around 11:30 a.m. of 26th November 2024. It is likely
to move closer to the east coast of the island and intensify further into a cyclonic storm on 27th November.
Under influence of the system cloudy skies will prevailed over most parts of the island, very heavy showers
and strong gusty winds can be expected in Northern, Northcentral, Eastern, Uva, Northwestern and Central
